con:testCase.name: Test Case-DEV-Invalidate-Config
con:testCase.con:description:
https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3649
As QA I want to implement tests only for manual execution before release like tests for logging or wss-security to coverage GUI-Service:
invalidateAll for
group: CONFIGURATION
Note! Because settings on DEV must be tested for releases, implemented test-case must be disabled for regression tests. Implemented test-case must be executed each time one new release candidate together with tests for logging or ws-security.
Followed settings group must be changed:
Change values for followed CONFIGURATION group based on test-case: TestSuite-DEV-BrandAccessRights–> BadCase-DEV-DirectDebit-Rights (Oleg must delivery sql-query for change and restore configuration!)
DirectDebit.
For change configuration settings followed test-steps must be implemented:
Save current configuration before test-case execution. Exec test-case: TestSuite-DEV-BrandAccessRights–> BadCase-DEV-DirectDebit-Rights --> Expected: test-case is passed. Exec query-script from delivered from Oleg for configuration change against core-db. Exec test-case: TestSuite-DEV-BrandAccessRights–> BadCase-DEV-DirectDebit-Rights --> Expected: test-case is passed. Exec Gui-Service: invalidateAll with group: CONFIGURATION Exec test-case: TestSuite-DEV-BrandAccessRights–> BadCase-DEV-DirectDebit-Rights --> Expected: test-case is failed. Exec query-script from Oleg against DB for restore. Exec Gui-Service: invalidateAll with group: CONFIGURATION again. Exec test-case: TestSuite-DEV-BrandAccessRights–> BadCase-DEV-DirectDebit-Rights --> Expected: test-case is passed.
Acceptance criteria:
Present current values from configuration before test-execution in review meeting. Exec implemented tests step by step and view changes. Exec invalidation and view changed configuration. Set all configuration values back and view restored values.

con:config.con:query: --make table writable before test execution alter table CHANNELS READ WRITE
--deactivate directdebit channel update CHANNELS set ACTIVE = '0' where NAME = 'directdebit'

con:elements.con:expectedValue: BrandId: 1 not accepted for channel: directdebit
Service provider not accepted for channel
Service provider not accepted for channel

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>BrandId: 1 not accepted for channel: directdebit</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Service provider not accepted for channel</originatorMessage> <errorCode>1050</errorCode> <message>Service provider not accepted for channel</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: --activate directdebit channel update CHANNELS set ACTIVE = '1' where NAME = 'directdebit'
--make table read only again alter table CHANNELS READ ONLY
